mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url, COUNT(DISTINCT s.quiz_id) AS solved_quiz_count, SUM(s.correct_count) AS total_correct, SUM(s.total_questions) AS total_questions, (SUM(s.correct_count) / SUM(s.total_questions)) AS accuracy, MAX(s.submitted_at) AS last_submitted_at FROM submissions s JOIN users u ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE s.user_id IS NOT NULL AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND s.submitted_at >= #{start} AND s.submitted_at < #{end} GROUP BY u.id, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url HAVING solved_quiz_count > 0 ORDER BY (COUNT(DISTINCT s.quiz_id) * (0.3 + 0.7 * ((SUM(s.correct_count) + 20 * 0.6) / (SUM(s.total_questions) + 20)))) DESC, last_submitted_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
